name: Super Space Sailor
description:
Peter is a Space Sailor from the Chiguire race. He wants to reunite with his family but, a big monster called Illusion forced him into a strange artificial planet, manipulated by Illusion's mind. Peter shall find a way home and discover the mistery of Illusion's power.

This game has many exits and endings. It plays like a "Metroid" styled adventure but with a more cartoon-ish look and a new weapon: the bow and arrow. It has various forms of extra content and music.

This game is entirely free. If you want to make content of it I will be really pleased! Hope you enjoy.
